card.name: CW - Cannot create users - Attorney front end

data.text: @yasserogier Logged into www.courtworks.co.za with my login and he obviously used his. Selected Administration. Selected Management. Selected Manage Companies. Inserted Christo Dippenaar Attorneys. Went into the branch, then the users. Clicked on Add Users. Selected Var User. Added the name and surname of user and the email address. Inserted 0 by cell number (like the other users), Inserted tel number 0514302370, Inserted any date of birth. Username and password is email address. Clicked on Add User. Got error. If you require a video shot let me know.
